attributes.action: outlaw all forms of body mutilation including but not limited to genital mutilation as unacceptable in any form or for any reason, especially when it is targeted at minors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No tradition, custom or religion can justify the barbaric, degrading and inhumane treatment suffered by victims of mutilation whatever their race, gender, religion or background. Body/genital mutilation should be punishable as a criminal offence.
